entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
